modName: Luke Evans - Dracula Untold - face configuration
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ff0000] [/color][b][size=6][color=#ff0000]Luke Evans "Dracula Untold" character![/color]
[/size]
[font=Tahoma][size=4]This is not a mod , but a savegame file that will make you start the game with the character already configured and ready.
Alternatively you can download a text file which shows the configuration for the character.

Have fun !


[/size][/font][/b][font=Trebuchet MS][color=#ff7700][size=5][b]Recommended mods:[/b][/size][/color]

[list][*][size=2][b]THE DAWNGUARD DLC[/b][/size][/*]
[*][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/44496/? ][b]Hill house[/b] [/url][color=#cccccc]by Ithlia[/color] (the best house for a vampire player)[/size][/*]
[*][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/173/?][/url][url=http://][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/173/?][b]No hairy male body[/b][/url] [color=#cccccc]by [b]Srimk[/b][/color][b][/b][/size][/*]
[*][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/11487/?][b]Vampire Overhaul[/b] [/url][color=#cccccc]by [/color][color=#cccccc]Sann[/color][b] (for a better vampire experience) - anche in [/b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/11831/?]ITALIANO[/url][b] [/b]
[/size][/*]
[*][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12798/?][b]Crimson Tide Blood[/b][/url][b] [/b][color=#cccccc]by [/color][color=#cccccc]Magus[/color] (better Blood graphics) - anche in [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28045/?tab=2&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmodfiles%2F%3Fid%3D28045&pUp=1]ITALIANO[/url]
[/size][/*]
[*][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/38829/?][b]Better Vampire Fangs and Eyes[/b][/url][b] [/b][color=#cccccc]by Aipex8[/color][/size][/*]
[*][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/21689/?][b]Bat Travel Vampire Power[/b][/url][b] [/b][color=#cccccc]by [/color][color=#cccccc]Didymus Ei[/color] - anche in [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/43201/?]ITALIANO[/url]

author: DigitalSteven
